data.name: Ultimate Offset
data.description: 100% offset account linked to packaged variable rate home loan

additionalBundleUris.description: A single annual fee covering home loan and other services free of charge

bundles.name: Ultimate Package
bundles.description: A single annual fee covering home loan and other services free of charge
bundles.additionalInfo: An Ultimate package includes, for an annual package fee of $395, at least one Ultimate Housing loan or Ultimate Line of Credit facility and any/ all of the optional products such Ultimate Offset, Credit card (Annual fee waived), no Establishment fees nor loan conversion fees on Ultimate products. Credit approval and account linkage conditions apply.

features.additionalInfo: Receive notification from bank of your nominated transactions (e.g. low account balance warning; credits over $500)

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be identifiable in terms of legislative requirements

fees.name: Bank transfer fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when an amount is processed on your behalf to an account in our name from another financial institution to enable us to credit your account.

fees.name: Bulk coin purchase fee
fees.additionalInfo: Existing branch stock 2.00% of total value (minimum $2.00)

fees.name: Foreign currency conversion fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3.00% of the value of the transaction in AUD debited to your account when you make a transaction in a foreign currency or in AUD when you are outside of Australia; or in Australia where the merchant or financial institution that processes the transaction is located outside of Australia

fees.name: Dormant account fee
fees.additionalInfo: $15.00 six monthly if an account has no transactions (other than government charges or interest) processed during the preceding 24 months

fees.name: SMS alert fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each SMS alert that is sent to you notifying you of account balances and/or other nominated transactions.

fees.name: Unclaimed monies fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if an account had no transactions (other than government charges or interest) processed during the last three years.

fees.name: Cheque honour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if we honour a cheque that would otherwise have been dishonoured due to insufficient funds.

fees.name: EFT transaction fee (RTGS)
fees.additionalInfo: Transfer funds on the same day to an account at another financial institution

fees.name: Stop payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to stop payment of a cheque you have drawn or a bank cheque.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer - Foreign Currency (Outgoing International Payment)
fees.additionalInfo: When transferring in a foreign currency. Fee is inclusive of $20.00 payable to the product issuer, Convera Australia Pty Ltd.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer - Australian Currency (Outgoing International Payment)
fees.additionalInfo: When transferring in AUD. Fee is inclusive of $40.00 payable to the product issuer, Convera Australia Pty Ltd.

fees.name: Payment service creation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a customer requests we create an Easypay or Third Party Payment Service to other than a Greater Bank account.
